attributes.action: allow those who are unable to work but do not require a carer to claim disability living allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the law currently stands, to be eligible to claim disability living allowance, you need to have a physical or mental disability, and also require help caring for yourself.  However, there are many people who cannot work due to medical conditions (such as interstitial cystitis), but are uneligible for dla as they do not require help to care for themselves.
